department: DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND GOVERNMENT SERVICES
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on 20-10-2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of TRANSPORTS CANADA, is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the acquisition of 36 totes of dust control product to be used on the gravel runways, taxiways and apron at the Cree airports of Waskaganish, Eastmain and Wemindji (Quebec), including the pick up of 58 empty totes, as detailed in the request for proposals.
